definition: a loose temporary sewing stitch to hold layers of fabric together, to cover with liquid before cooking
details:
noun
- a loose temporary sewing stitch to hold layers of fabric together
= synonyms: basting
verb
- to cover with liquid before cooking
= example: to cover with liquid before cooking
- to sew together loosely, with large stitches
= example: to sew together loosely, with large stitches
= synonyms: tack
- to strike violently and repeatedly
= example: to strike violently and repeatedly
= synonyms: batter, clobber
